aboutWarning: Warning: This computer program is protected by copyright law and international treaties. Unauthorized reproduction or distribution of this program, or any portion of it, may result in severe civil and criminal penalties, and will be prosecuted to the maximum extent possible under the law.
wizardAbout: This project aims to revive the clean, minimalist essence of internet browsing, prioritizing elegance. With a streamlined interface, BeautyFox offers users a refreshing escape from the overwhelming complexity of modern browsers.
wizardEnableIE10DeveloperPreviewAbout: Continue with Internet Explorer 10 Developer Preview About Dialog
wizardEnableIE10ConsumerPreviewAbout: Continue with Internet Explorer 10 Consumer Preview About Dialog
wizardEnableIE10ReleasePreviewAbout: Continue with Internet Explorer 10 Release Preview About Dialog
wizardContinueIE10: Continue with normal Internet Explorer 10 appearance
wizardEnableIE11Info: Changes 'About Internet Explorer' dialog to contain version 11 information
wizardEnableIE11Win10: Use the Windows 10 Internet Explorer 11 look and feel
wizardEnableIE11Win10Info: Adds feedback button (smiley face, can be dragged out) and changes the 'About Internet Explorer' function to open the Windows version reporter applet with Internet Explorer information
wizardCheckBoxTabs: Move tabs to the navigation bar
wizardCheckBoxDownloadProgress: Show download progress in Downloads button
wizardComboBoxEdgeButton: Microsoft Edge button (only in the chosen appearance):
wizardCheckBoxOnlyIcons: Show only icons in the command bar
wizardCheckBoxFakeDropdown: Show fake dropdown arrow icons in command bar buttons
wizardCheckboxHideSettingsPopup: Hide the settings button in pop-up windows
wizardCheckboxAccentNavBtns: Enable Windows accent colour for navigation buttons
wizardCheckboxAccentToolbars: Enable Windows accent colour for toolbars (only in the chosen appearance)
wizardCheckboxAWMAccentColouring: Enable Aero Window Manager accent colour support
wizardRestart: To apply the changes, Firefox needs to be restarted. You can access BeautyFox settings at any time by shift clicking the settings menu.
